japanese:
おおっ！
見てください、らいはちゃん！
あそこの木に見たことない鳥がとまってます！
translation:
Ohh!
Look, Raiha-chan! There's a cool looking bird on that tree!
I've never seen a bird like that before!

japanese:
わあっ！　ホントだ！
あんな綺麗な色の鳥、初めて見た！
translation:
Wow! You're right! I've never seen anything like it!
It looks so colorful!

japanese:
大きいのが２羽、小さいのが１羽……。
きっと家族ですね。
translation:
Two big ones and a small one...
They must be a family.

japanese: かわいい～！
translation: How cute!

japanese: 相変わらず元気ねぇ、四葉は。
translation: You're as energetic as ever, Yotsuba.

japanese:
そうですね。
らいはちゃんが一緒なので、いつもより
パワフルさが増しているように感じます。
translation:
I've noticed too.
She always super energetic when she's with Raiha-chan.

japanese:
あれを羨ましいとは言わないけど、
さすがに、もうちょっと
体力はつけておくべきだったわ……。
translation:
I'm not saying I'm envious of her,
but I really should have built up my stamina
a bit more...

japanese:
大丈夫？
ギブアップなら、私がおんぶしてあげよっか？
translation:
Are you okay?
Shall I give you a piggyback ride?

japanese:
はあ？
あんた、なに言って……。
translation:
Huh?
Stop joking around, as if...

japanese: ほら、お姉ちゃんの背中だぞ～？
translation:
Come on, 
don't you want a piggyback ride from your big sister?

japanese:
誰がするかっ！
こんな歳になって！
translation:
Who'd do that?!
At this age!

japanese:
五月ちゃんはどう？
疲れてるなら遠慮なくどーぞ。
translation:
What about you, Itsuki-chan?
If you're tired, don't hesitate to get on!

japanese: 私も結構です！
translation: I'm also fine!

japanese: それにしても、一花はずいぶんと余裕ですね。
translation: At any rate, you seem to be doing just fine, Ichika.

japanese:
まあねぇ、これでも女優だから。
体力づくりは結構やってたりするんだ。
translation:
Well, I am an actress, after all.
I do a fair amount of physical training.

japanese:
そういえばあんた、だらしないくせに
日課のジョギングだけはちゃんとやってたわね。
translation: You're such a sloppy person, but funny enough, you somehow consistenly jog everyday.

japanese:
というか、私たちよりも
後ろにいる２人の心配をしたほうがよさそう。
translation:
Instead of worrying about ourselves, 
we should be worrying about the two behind us.

japanese:
……あらまあ。
いつの間にか、あんな後ろに。
translation:
...Oh dear.
They're quite far behind.

japanese:
本格的にヤバそうになったら、四葉たちに
ペースダウンをお願いしないとね。
translation:
If it looks like they're in real trouble,
we may have to ask Yotsuba's party to slow down.

japanese: ぜぇ、はぁ、はぁ……。
translation:
*wheeze*
*huff* *huff*

japanese:
大丈夫？
前にいる一花たちが、こっち見てるよ？
translation: Are you okay? Itsuki and the others are looking at us worried.

japanese:
（くっ……。
　唯一の男として荷物持ちくらいはと大見得を
　切った手前、ギブアップするわけには……）
translation:
(Damn...
 I can't just give up now after boasting about
 being the only guy carrying the luggage.)

japanese:
お弁当のせいだよね。
ごめん、張り切って作りすぎちゃった。
translation:
It's probably because of the bento.
I got too excited and made too much. Sorry.

japanese:
もしキツかったら、半分持つよ？
あと、一花たちを呼び戻して……。
translation:
If it's too heavy, I can carry half of it.
And I'll call Itsuki and the others back...

japanese: いや！　助けはいらん！
translation: No! I don't need any help!

japanese: でも……。
translation: But...

japanese:
お前も、そんな申し訳なさそうな顔するな。
これくらいの重さ、なんてことない。
translation:
Don't feel bad.
It's not that heavy.

japanese:
……ありがとう。
やっぱりフータローは優しい。
translation:
...Thanks.
You really are kind, Futaro.

japanese:
ふっ、俺をなめるなよ？
この無人島生活で、かなり体力がついたからな。
translation:
Heh, don't underestimate me.
I've gained some stamina being on this island.

japanese: ふふ、また言ってる。
translation: Teehee, you're always saying that.

japanese:
……あの、三玖さん？
さっきよりも歩くペースが上がってませんか？
translation:
...Um, Miku-san?
Is it just me, or you're walking a little faster than usual?

japanese:
変わってないよ？
フータローのペースが落ちてるだけ。
translation:
Uhhh, I don't think so.
I think you're the one who's walking slower, Futaro.

japanese: な、なんだと……。
translation: Wh-what did you say?

japanese: ふふっ！
translation: Teehee!

japanese:
なんのことだ？
俺はただ、事実を言ってるだけなんだがな。
translation:
What are you talking about?
I'm just stating the facts.

japanese: そうやって誤魔化すところも、やっぱり優しい。
translation: Even when you try to play it cool, you're still kind.

japanese:
ペースが落ちてるよ？
優しいところだけじゃなくて、
格好いいところも、見せてほしいな。
translation:
Come on Futaro. Your pace is slowing down.
I want to see not only your kind side,
but also your cool side.

japanese: お前のほうがずっと優しいだろ。
translation: You're way kinder than I am.

japanese: え？　どうして？
translation: Huh? Why do you say that?

japanese:
確かに弁当は重いが、それだけ
俺たちのことを考えて作ってくれたんだろ？
translation:
I know how much love and care 
you put into making each bento for us.

japanese:
むしろ礼を言うのはこっちだ。
ありがとな、三玖。
translation:
I should be the one thanking you.
Thanks, Miku.

japanese:
わ、私だけじゃなくて、二乃とらいはちゃんにも
お礼を言ってあげて。
translation:
Um, don't forget to thank Nino and Raiha-chan too.
Not just me.

japanese: ああ、弁当を食うときに改めてな。
translation: Ah, I'll thank them when we eat.

japanese:
よーし、そろそろ本気出すか。
遅れてる分、ペース上げていくぞ――
translation:
Alright, time to get serious.
Let's pick up the pace to make up for lost time%p-2;――

japanese: うおっ！？
translation: WOAH?!

japanese: フータロー！　大丈夫！？
translation: Futaro! Are you okay?!

japanese:
も、問題ない。
ちょっとよろけただけだ。
弁当も無事だと思う、たぶん。
translation:
I-I'm fine.
I just stumbled a bit.
The bento should fine. I think.

japanese:
お弁当より、フータローが転んで
怪我しないかのほうが、ずっと心配だよ。
translation:
I'm more worried about you falling and getting hurt
than the bento, Futaro.

japanese: やっぱり私が半分持ったほうが……。
translation: Maybe I should have carried half of it...

japanese:
そもそも、弁当は１つのリュックに入ってるんだぞ？
リュックを半分に分けるのは無理がある。
translation:
The bentos are all in one backpack.
It's impossible.

japanese: あ、そうだった。
translation: Oh, right.

japanese:
気持ちだけ受け取っておく。
ほら、急ごうぜ。
早く進まないと、一花たちにまで置いてかれちまう。
translation:
It's the thought that counts. Thanks.
Anyway, come on, let's hurry. If we don't move faster,
we'll be left behind by Ichika and the others.

japanese: なら、私が風太郎を引っ張る。
translation: Then let me help you, Futaro.

japanese: 引っ張るって……。
translation: Help me...

japanese:
ちょ、三玖？
なんで俺の手を？
translation:
Wha%p-2;――%p; Miku?
What are you doing with my hand?

japanese: こうして歩けば、登りの道も楽になるかなって。
translation:
I was thinking it might make it easier for you to walk uphill,
If I pulled you.

japanese: 確かに、これなら楽は楽だが……。
translation: Certainly, it's easier like this, but...

japanese: さあ、遅れてる分を取り返さないと。
translation: Alright, we need to make up for lost time.

japanese:
待て待て。
そのまま歩きだしたら、今度はお前が危ない。
translation:
Wait hold on.
If we keep walking like this,
you'll hurt yourself.

japanese:
私は大丈夫だよ。
まだ体力も残ってるし。
translation:
I'll be okay.
I still have plenty of strength left.

japanese: そうじゃなくて……。
translation: That's not what I meant...

japanese: あっ……。
translation: Oh...

japanese:
どうしよう。
フータローの手を掴んだままだと
前を向いて歩けない。
translation:
What should I do?
If I keep holding your hand like this,
I'll have a hard time walking.

japanese: だろ？
translation: Right?

japanese:
ふふっ！
いい方法だと思ったのに、全然ダメだった。
translation:
Teehee!
I thought it was a good idea,
but I was completely wrong.

japanese:
はは！　まったくだ。
笑い事じゃないんだがな。
translation:
Haha! My goodness.
It's not a laughing matter.

japanese:
でも、フータローをこのままにはできないから
片手で引っ張るよ。
translation:
But I can't leave you like this, Futaro,
so I'll pull you with one hand.

japanese: それならまあ、危なくはないか。
translation: Then I guess it's not as dangerous.

japanese: じゃあ、行こう。
translation: Alright then, let's go.

japanese:
……今度は絵面的にアレだな。
小さい子どもかよ、俺は。
translation:
...I look like those toddlers being led to kindergarten by a teacher. 
You treat me like a little kid.

japanese: うん、これって幼稚園の先生になった気分。
translation: Yeah, I feel like I'm a kindergarten teacher.

japanese:
たまに、幼稚園児がこんな風に
街を歩いていたりするよな。
translation:
Sometimes, you see little kids walking
around the city like this.

japanese:
フータローくん、こっちですよ～。
足元には気をつけてね？
translation:
Futaro-kuuun, mind your step.
Come over here pleaaase.

japanese: って、やめろ！　先生の真似をするな！
translation: STOP IT! You're not funny!

japanese:
フータローくん？
大声を出したら、めっ、ですよ？
translation:
Futaro-kun?
Be a good boy and no shouting, okay?

japanese: マジでやめてくれ……。
translation: Please stop...

japanese: ふふ、ごめん。
translation: Teehee, sorry.

japanese:
でも、フータローには
いつも引っ張ってもらってばかりだから、
私が引っ張るのって、なんだか新鮮。
translation: Its feel great being the one leading for once.

japanese: 俺は恥ずかしくて仕方ない……。
translation: No, it's so embarassing for me...

japanese: でも、歩くのは楽でしょ？
translation: But, it's easier to walk, when I pull you right?

japanese: ……それは否定しない。
translation: ...I can't deny that.

japanese: じゃあ、このまま目的地までこうして……。
translation:
Okay,
let's just keep going like this
until we reach there...

japanese: はい、ストップ。
translation: And, stop.

japanese: わっ！？
translation: WOAH?!

japanese: うおっ！？　二乃？
translation: WOAH?! Nino?

japanese:
まったく、見てないのをいいことに
抜け駆けしてくれちゃって。
translation: Look at you guys, sneaking out and having fun.

japanese: ……なんのこと？
translation: ...What are you talking about?

japanese:
２人ともかなり遅れてたから、
心配で戻ってきたんだよ。
translation:
Both of you guys were taking so long,
so I got worried and came to check on you two.

japanese: 四葉たちには、少し先で待ってもらっています。
translation: Yotsuba and the others are waiting a little ahead.

japanese: すまん、迷惑をかけたな。
translation: Sorry for worrying you.

japanese:
気にしないでください。
これもハイキングの醍醐味でしょう。
translation:
Don't worry about it.
It's all part of the hiking experience.

japanese:
というわけだから、はい！
今度は私がフー君を引っ張ってあげるわ。
translation:
So then, here!
This time I'll pull you, Fu-kun.

japanese: 二乃！？
translation: Nino?!

japanese:
あっ、じゃあ私も。
二乃が右手で、私が左手でどう？
translation:
Let me help too!
Nino, you take the right hand, I'll take the left!

japanese:
では私は、上杉君を後ろから押してあげましょう。
リュックも重いでしょうし。
translation:
Then I'll push Uesugi-kun from behind!
His backpack must be heavy too.

japanese: 五月まで……。
translation: Itsuki, not you too...

japanese:
やめろって！
そこまで介護されなくてもちゃんと歩ける！
translation:
Stop it!
I can walk on my own without your guys help!

japanese: ほらほら、遠慮なんてしないでいいから。
translation: Come on now, don't be shy.

japanese: 目的地まであと少しだから、一緒に頑張りましょ。
translation:
We're almost there,
we can do this.

japanese:
ええい、離せ！
こんな情けない姿をらいはに見せるわけにはいかん！
translation:
Enooough, let go of me!
I can't have Raiha see me like this!

japanese: むむう……。
translation: Mmmhh...

japanese:
三玖！　頼む！
こいつらをなんとかしてくれ！
translation:
Miku! I'm begging you!
Please, do something about them!

japanese:
……両手は取られたから、
私も五月と一緒に後ろから押す。
translation:
...Both of your hands are taken,
so I'll push you from behind with Itsuki.

japanese: お前もかよ！！
translation: YOU TOO?!

japanese: では、私たちも左右で分かれましょう。
translation: You take the left side and I'll take the right.

japanese: うん。
translation: Yes.

japanese: さあ！
translation: Now!

japanese: 私たちと一緒に！
translation: All together!

japanese: 目的地に向かって……。
出発、しんこー。
translation: GOOOOO!!

japanese: やーめーろーー！！
translation: STOOOPPP!!
